item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a professional Software Developer with 5 years of professional experience working with Javascript, PHP, SQL databases and other tools/frameworks. I have worked both for the public and private sector and have mentored other junior developers. A big fan of open source technologies I am always trying new tools and participating in different communities. Programming Languages: PHP (5.6, 7.x and 8.x) Javascript HTML5 CSS3 Dart C Python GDScript Frameworks/SDK: Laravel Bootstrap Tailwind Vue.
